CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, November 20, 1954, pg. 9, reads: "New Home Nursing Course - A six-week home nursing course given by the Red Cross and sponsored by Soho Community House at Wadsworth Hall started Tuesday, Nov. 16.  Some of those taking the course are...  Bottom row: Grace Brown, Viola Goodlowe, Lula Miller, Mildred Payne, Catherine Stewart, instructor, and Ida Lee.  Seated: Laura Perkins and Leona Star. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Red Cross home nursing class participants with scale, including Grace Brown, Viola Goodlowe, Lula Miller, Mildred Payne, instructor Catherine Stewart, Ida Lee, Laura Perkins, and Leona Star gathered in Soho Community House, Wadsworth Hall
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Red Cross and Red Crescent.Soho Community House (Pittsburgh, Pa.)
